name: Army Weapons Tester 3D
description:
Army Weapons Tester 3D is a crazy military 3D truck driving game. You will feel like a real fanatic army trucker in this epic simulation game. You are a military truck driver in an army base camp, in this base camp you been assigned a mission to drive safe military vehicle to real camp and to repel enemies that’s urge us to wage a war.
Drive this amazing powerful vehicle in hilly area and mountain environment. Keep an eye on the enemy movement because this is a very dangerous area. Enemy wants to perform surgical strike.
